column4: i have a usb stick in the back of a machine so that a cron job can do a weekly backup to it. Does having it constantly powered instead of plugging it in each friday reduce its lifespan - is it pure reads and writes?
My experience with computers (since 1970) would indicate, if you have a good power source, to leave it plugged in...powering up and down and up and down is what is not good for electronics generaly
